attributes.title: No
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever seen absolutely horrible I highly recommend never in your life for any reason downloading this horrific app

attributes.title: You know what you know what Trump would look great in? A coffin✨🥳🌸💕
attributes.review:
I got this app for a second and saw a racist homophobic pedo Cheeto that looks exactly like our president Must’ve been a coincidence.

 Oh wait

attributes.title: CREEPY
attributes.review: someone that called himself “cheeto man” sent me a personalized email saying that he was behind the screen when i went into the app. i’m pretty sure that isn’t legal.

attributes.title: The app... just no❤️✨
attributes.review: As I open the app I saw a pic of chetto man😑. A couple seconds later my sister was levitating from the couch and fell on top of her😝. Then I saw chetto  naked and my lollipop was levitating as well. This is a scam. I just want to say..... DO NOT VOTE CHETTO 2020 luv❤️

attributes.title: STREAM NICKI AND BTS 🦄❤️
attributes.review: This app is so busted I dislike everything about it, the layout, the design, the creator. There was little to no thought put into this app just like there is no thought into what mr. Donny days on live television. Worst this ever anyways Stan NICKI AND BTS 🦄❤️

attributes.title: This app is beyond horrible
attributes.review: It was going through the app then something crazy happened my pet fish was breathing underwater. 😍😍 soo I took it for a walk and gave it a star 💕💕.. my starfish ⭐️

attributes.title: traumatizing
attributes.review: I've never seen an app so blatantly supporting racism. First look on the app and I see a picture of donald trump naked getting a spray tan. I can't believe this app is supporting a cheeto to become president. Hilariously sad.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Super slow and glitchy made my phone glitch altogether as well. Wish I could give it zero stars ❤️

attributes.title: Absolutely HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app gave my phone a virus! It Fritzed out my phone and made it glitch and reset! Absolutely ATROCIOUS. It’s HORRIBLE quality and completely messed my entire phone up. 🤢

attributes.title: No.. just no
attributes.review: Ewww as soon as I open the app, I am greeted by a Cheeto man. I am officially scarred. I need to go to my therapist every day because of this.. it haunts me. I can’t anymore. I’m scared. I’m not safe. Thanks to this app 😀
